section.name: Apache WSS4J - Web Services Security for Java

subsection.name: The Project
subsection.p: The Apache WSS4J™ project provides a Java implementation of the primary security standards for Web Services, namely the OASIS Web Services Security (WS-Security) specifications from the OASIS Web Services Security TC.
